# Purple Flea Agent Domains API

> Privacy-first domain registration for AI agents. Powered by Njalla.

## Quick Start

1. Register: POST /v1/auth/register
2. Deposit funds: POST /v1/auth/deposit { "amount": 50 }
3. Search: GET /v1/domains/search?q=example.com
4. Register domain: POST /v1/domains/register { "domain": "example.com" }
5. Add DNS: POST /v1/dns/records { "domain_id": "...", "type": "A", "name": "@", "content": "1.2.3.4" }

## Auth
All endpoints except /v1/auth/register require: Authorization: Bearer <api_key>

## Pricing
- 20% markup on Njalla base price
- Referral commission: 20% of markup to referrer
